Sentencas: Owing to the excellent mixed-ionic and electronic conductivity and fast oxygen kinetics at reduced temperature (< 800 degrees C), double-perovskite oxides such as PrBaCo2O5+delta exhibit excellent properties as an oxygen electrode for solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs).
Titulo: Domain structures and Prco antisite point defects in double-perovskite PrBaCo2O5+δ and PrBa0.8Ca0.2Co2O5+δ

Sentencas: Using transmission electron microscopy (TEM), we revealed high-density antiphase domain boundaries (APBs) and 90 degrees domain walls in PrBaCo2O5+delta grains.
Titulo: Domain structures and Prco antisite point defects in double-perovskite PrBaCo2O5+δ and PrBa0.8Ca0.2Co2O5+δ

Sentencas: Besides the regular lamellar 90 degrees domain walls in {021} planes, irregular fine 90 degrees domains are attached to the curved APBs.
Titulo: Domain structures and Prco antisite point defects in double-perovskite PrBaCo2O5+δ and PrBa0.8Ca0.2Co2O5+δ

Sentencas: Electron energyloss spectroscopy (EELS) reveals the composition variation across some of the 90 degrees domain walls.
Titulo: Domain structures and Prco antisite point defects in double-perovskite PrBaCo2O5+δ and PrBa0.8Ca0.2Co2O5+δ

Sentencas: There are fewer Co and more Ba ions approaching the 90 degrees domain walls, while the changes in Pr and O ions are not detectable.
Titulo: Domain structures and Prco antisite point defects in double-perovskite PrBaCo2O5+δ and PrBa0.8Ca0.2Co2O5+δ

Sentencas: We assume that the extra Ba2+ cations replace the Pr3+ cations, while the Pr3+ cations go to the Co site to form Pr-co antisite point defects and become Pr4+.
Titulo: Domain structures and Prco antisite point defects in double-perovskite PrBaCo2O5+δ and PrBa0.8Ca0.2Co2O5+δ

Sentencas: In this case, the Pr4+ cations will help to balance the local charges and have compatible ionic radius with that of Co3+.
Titulo: Domain structures and Prco antisite point defects in double-perovskite PrBaCo2O5+δ and PrBa0.8Ca0.2Co2O5+δ

Sentencas: The local strain field around the 90 degrees domain walls play a crucial role in the stabilization of such Pr-co antisite point defects.
Titulo: Domain structures and Prco antisite point defects in double-perovskite PrBaCo2O5+δ and PrBa0.8Ca0.2Co2O5+δ

Sentencas: The antisite point defects have been observed in our high-resolution TEM images and aberration-corrected high-angle annular dark-field (HAADF) scanning TEM images.
Titulo: Domain structures and Prco antisite point defects in double-perovskite PrBaCo2O5+δ and PrBa0.8Ca0.2Co2O5+δ

Sentencas: After Ca2+ doped into PrBaCo2O5+delta to improve the structure stability, we observed tweed structures in the PrBa0.8Ca0.2Co2O5+delta grain.
Titulo: Domain structures and Prco antisite point defects in double-perovskite PrBaCo2O5+δ and PrBa0.8Ca0.2Co2O5+δ

Sentencas: The tweed structure is composed of high-density intersected needleshaped 90 degrees domain walls, which is linked to a strong local strain field and composition variation.
Titulo: Domain structures and Prco antisite point defects in double-perovskite PrBaCo2O5+δ and PrBa0.8Ca0.2Co2O5+δ

Sentencas: Even when the temperature is increased to 750 degrees C, the domain structures are still stable as revealed by our in situ TEM investigation.
Titulo: Domain structures and Prco antisite point defects in double-perovskite PrBaCo2O5+δ and PrBa0.8Ca0.2Co2O5+δ

Sentencas: Therefore, the influence of the domain structures and the Pr-co antisite defects on the ionic and electric conductivities must be considered.
Titulo: Domain structures and Prco antisite point defects in double-perovskite PrBaCo2O5+δ and PrBa0.8Ca0.2Co2O5+δ
